lst.name: sentence
lst.str: The liberalisation, particularly the introduction of off-floor trading in stocks and bonds on a net-basis under the AIM system, has been described by bourse officials as Amsterdam's "little bang," a reference to sweeping reforms last October on the London Stock Exchange known as Big Bang.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: AIM, started in a trial run early last year and officially in force from January 1 this year, is already credited with halting the growth in Dutch stocks traded abroad, mainly London.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Amsterdam, which feels an on-floor facility with fees is vital for smaller investors, said it needs to overhaul the floor to accommodate new technology and new members.
